global_caption: a scene featuring a brown-haired stocky man in a white shirt and brown pants wearing sunglasses holding a map with one hand while putting his other hand inside his pocket with a silver watch, a fat woman with a T-shirt with various colors of flowers printed on it and blue short pants holding a paper cup with her left hand while her right hand is holding a silver suitcase and also wearing small earrings, a brown-haired stocky Latin man with a bright green T-shirt and brown short pants putting both of his hands inside his pants' pockets with a silver watch only on his left hand, a slim woman taking a picture with her camera while holding her straw hat and wearing a sky blue dress and sandals, and yellow European-style buildings that seem famous to tourists for their antique style.
